page.title: 01Summary of area as a whole
page.content: Our study area is mainly rural in character.There are two villages in our area;Golden Green to the east and Hadlow in the north east corner.To the west is the edge of Tonbridge which is the main urban development.There are a number of interesting and historic buildings especially the castle and church in Hadlow,and a number of farm and oast houses in the surrounding area. The area has little industry being mainly a farming area.Fruit farming is the most important,but the area also has a dairy farm,nurseries,areas devoted to hops and large areas of grain crops. To the south runs the River Medway. The river is a major recreational resource,being used for canoeing, pleasure boat cruising and fishing.Our area also has a beautiful golf course.
